parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description:
The domain name of the website.

>  A forwarding rule must be configured for the domain name. You can call the [DescribeDomains](~~91724~~) operation to query all domain names.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. This value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds.

>  This UNIX timestamp must indicate a point in time that is accurate to the minute.

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description: The interval for returning data. Unit: seconds. Valid values are 300, 3600, and 86400. If the time span between StartTime and EndTime is less than 3 days, valid values are 300, 3600, and 86400. If the time span between StartTime and EndTime is from 3 to 30 days, valid values are 3600 and 86400. If the time span between StartTime and EndTime is 31 days or longer, the valid value is 86400. If you leave this parameter empty or specify an invalid value, the default value is used.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description:
The region in which your service is deployed. Valid values:

*   **cn**: a region in the Chinese mainland.
*   **cn-hongkong**: a region outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The beginning of the time range to query. This value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds.

>  This UNIX timestamp must indicate a point in time that is accurate to the minute.
